attributes.action: pressure the bbc to air the gaza appeal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hello everybody, 
i call you here today to help in your part of the gaza crisis
there have been thousands of houses demolished and families killed and busninesses ruined in gaza during the israeli offensive , nonetheless the bbc has declined to broadcast an appeal for gaza , i hope u find it in your hearts to spend a minute or so to sign this petition in hopes it will help the palestinians affected by israels terror acts

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
